name: Optimism Engine (Series 2) 2.2
description:
Optimism Engine is an ongoing series that explores different paths of generative art. Produced with Processing/P5.JS in the early stages of the artwork (considered the gesso, drawing and imaginative period), then the work is fed through an ever-changing chain of other software and custom implementation techniques. 

1920 x 1920 pixels, 19 seconds | Ryan Thompson, October 2021 | www.ryanthompson.name (Collectors on primary can request high-res MP4 via Twitter @RT_Artwork)
